resources.string: Don\'t have an account? Press here to get started!

Welcome to 422nd Bank! Before we begin, we\'d like to remind you that 422nd Bank uses only the strictest security measures to keep you and your money safe. Additionally, we will never share your information with anybody, ever.\n\nIn order for us to best protect you, please take a moment to review the following security tips before creating your account.

Beware of fake phone calls, emails, and letters from impostors.

422nd Bank will NEVER ask you for your password or account information by email, telephone, or any other means except through the official 422nd Bank app.

Only contact 422nd Bank using the information found within this app.

When choosing a password, make it hard to guess!

Avoid using birthdays, anniversaries, or other important dates in your password.

Also avoid using the names of relatives, friends, and pets.

A good password contains a mix of uppercase and lowercase letters, numbers, and punctuation.

Finally, stay vigilant by regularly monitoring your transaction history!

The 422nd Bank app makes monitoring your account easier than ever.

If you see suspicious transactions on your account, you can report them by tapping on them in "Transactions" section of this app.
